FuncDef:
The candidate-path preference command configures a candidate path and its preference for an SR-MPLS TE Policy.
The undo candidate-path preference command deletes the candidate path and its preference configured for an SR-MPLS TE Policy.
By default, no candidate path is configured for an SR-MPLS TE Policy.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the preference value of a candidate path. The lager the value, the higher the preference.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 65535.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a candidate path and candidate path preference for an SR-MPLS TE Policy, run the candidate-path preference command. A maximum of 64 candidate paths can be configured for an SR-MPLS TE Policy. The candidate path with the highest preference takes effect. For the candidate paths of a manually configured SR-MPLS TE Policy, the preference parameter is mandatory and must be unique.
